articles.title: Black Mirror returns with mixed reviews from critics - BBC
articles.description: Its five new episodes deal with themes including paparazzi and audiences' obsession with true crime.
articles.content:
Charlie Brooker's dystopian Netflix show Black Mirror has returned for a sixth series with mixed reviews from critics.
